name: Ice Wings: Skies of Steel
description:
ICE WINGS -SKIES OF STEEL- a fast-action-Shoot 'em up game fo iOS devices.

--------------------------------------------

4 OUT OF 5 stars Review. Recommended game. www.the-app-shack.com

4 OUT OF 5 stars Review. "If you are an endless flying game enthusiasts you need to focus on this game: Ice Wings: Skies of Steel. " --- best10app.com

9 OUT OF 10 SCORE REVIEW - "Ice Wings is just one of those magical games that made me lose track time." "The game is a blast to play and something that people should not pass up" - MasterofHubes Reviews Blog

8 OUT OF 10 SCORE REVIEW - "The graphics are sharp, colourful and smooth." "As your learning curve increases, the game is more fun." "This is very well done for the cost and you will definitely get your money's worth."" - www.AppaSnap.com

8 & 7.5 OUT OF 10 SCORE VIDEO-REVIEW - "Just play this awesome game" - http://reviewsontherun.com/all/spotlight/ice-wings-skies-of-steel-ios-video-review/
--------------------------------------------

STUNNING 3D GRAPHICS!!
Great full-3D environments and aircrafts that immerse you in a amazing full-speed experience.

FREE YOUR ADRENALINE!!
Ice Wings mixes the adrenaline from the arcade machines with your hability for dodge obstacles while your speed increases,shooting to destroy the maximun number of targets for get the highest position in the score table.

UNLOCK NEW CONTENT!!
Use the stars that you earn destroying the targets for unlock new aircrafts.

AIRCRAFT FEATURES!!
Each aircraft has different features (weight,damage,aceleration,...), unlock them ! and play with your favourite.

INFINITE AND RANDOM LEVEL!!
Enjoy with random level generation system, each new game generates a new infinite level composition.

EASY CONTROLS!!
Very easy and intuitive controls, only slide your finger across the screen for dodge the obstacles and tap the fire button to shoot.

Support for Right/Left Handed.

FUTURE UPDATES!!
Ice Wings will have updates with a lot of new content (levels,new aircrafts, enemies, items, etc...).

Take your aircraft and show your SKILLS !!

Universap App.

iPad2: Graphical improvements for a better visual and game experience.

** PLEASE NOTE **
Device Requirement: iPhone4, iPhone4S, iPad, iPad2, iPod Touch(4th Generation).
